title: Endings Guide
content:
lp Astarion With The Ascension Ritual

Ending Requirements and Conditions:

Help Astarion with the ritual See the ritual until the end

How to Obtain Ending:

Provide help to Astarion when he asks for it Agree to let all of the spawns die to finish the ritual Choose all the options that will allow the ritual to continue

ENDING DESCRIPTION

Once you have defeated Cazador inside his secret room, he will retreat to rest in his sarcophagus. Astarion will open his stone coffin and wake him up from h
